sizes_available: about 2 1/4 inches in width, 2-inches in height
suggested_yarn: Barrett Wool Co. Home Worsted Weight
full_text: Little Hearts is a quick and fun free pattern available on the Barrett Wool Co. Journal. Click here for the free pattern! Happy Valentine’s Day from Barrett Wool Co.! Enjoy ~ Susan Here is some information you might like to know: Size: About 2 ¼-inches wide and 2-inches in height after felting Yarn: 10 grams of worsted weight wool. Samples are knit in: Barrett Wool Co. Wisconsin Woolen Spun and Home Worsted Weight. Needles: US size 7 or 4.5mm, set of 3 double-pointed needles or long circular for Magic Loop. Gauge: 5 stitches per inch before felting
name: Ravelry: Little Hearts pattern by Susan B. Anderson
